search.name: Amazon.com
search.description:
Search specific stores on Amazon.com. Searches all stores by default.
Switches:
/books - Books
/music - Popular Music
/classical - Classical Music
/dvd - DVDs
/vhs - VHS Tapes
/movies - Local Movie Showtimes
/toys - Toys
/baby - Baby Products
/computers - PC Hardware
/software - PC Software
/games - Video Games
/electronics - Electronics
/cellular - Cellular Phones
/photography - Camera & Photography
/tools - Tools & Hardware
/magazines - Magazines
/garden - Outdoor Living
/kitchen - Kitchen
/travel - Travel
/outlet - Outlet
/auctions - Auctions
/zshops - zShops
Examples:
amaz moxy fruvous /music
amaz harry potter /books
